attributes.additional_details:
Regulate the travel industry to end huge price increases during school holidays.

The Department of Education has announced that as from Sept 2013 there will be no entitlement to take children out of school during term time for holidays.

The government needs to step in and force travel companies to stop inflicting on parents, the ridiculous leap in prices during school holidays - this is unnecessary and greedy.

This petition aims to make the government regulate the travel industry and ensure that prices remain fair and constant all year round. No other company gets away with this!
